p: Knowing the active extracts, the authors carried out compound isolation of dichloromethane extracts from leaves (70.8%), fruits (75.4%), stems (70.3%), and roots; ethanol extracts from fruits (69.3%) and stems (58.0%), and also one inactive extract, root hexane (33.8%). From the isolated compounds, 14 were tested at 50, 100, and 250 Î¼g/mL concentrations.
